title: 求拯救，这应该怎么解决
author: qiuyi060
txt_content:
[严重] [ForgeModLoader] Unable to launch
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)

replies.txt_content: 把存档复制出来然后重新解压一下游戏    再把存档放进去   还不行的话 就是你的存档有问题..........

replies.author: 德玛西亚小蜗牛
replies.txt_content: 兼容问题吗》求最佳答案

replies.author: c601320218
replies.txt_content: 应该是有一个mod  FML无法加载

replies.author: qiuyi060
replies.txt_content:

应该是有一个mod  FML无法加载
mod全部删掉了也会出现这个报错……
